product_name: DAKINE Breaker Bike Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Defending you from gusty conditions during your bike ride, the DAKINE Breaker Bike Jacket for women cuts windchill while staying lightweight, breathable and comfortable. Wind-resistant ripstop nylon fabric is lightweight and soft against skin; vented back panel enhances breathability. Dropped rear hem ensures full coverage while in the riding position; rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs keep cold air out. Zip-secure chest pocket features internal cord port; jacket packs down into the chest pocket for easy storage and transport. DAKINE Breaker Bike Jacket features reflective details for enhanced visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Defending you from gusty conditions during your bike ride, the DAKINE Breaker Bike Jacket for women cuts windchill while staying lightweight, breathable and comfortable.
